package.description: This packages is a move_arm package wrapper (from the arm navigation stack). It is designed to work together with the iri_wam_navigation package. It can work with different WAM's tools only specifying the measures in the X-axis, Y-axis and Z-axis of the tools, without the need of a mesh file of the tool.
package.author: Ivan Rojas (ivan.rojas.j@gmail.com)
